snippet: Medtronic’s $42.9 billion bid for the rival device maker Covidien of Ireland and a positive outlook from home builders led the way as all three major indexes posted a rise.
abstract: Stocks rise slightly, due in part to another round of corporate mergers.
lead_paragraph: Medtronic’s $42.9 billion bid for the rival device maker Covidien of Ireland and a positive outlook from home builders led the way as all three major indexes posted a rise.

headline.main: News of Merger Proposals Helps Wall Street Manage a Small Gain
headline.print_headline: News of Merger Proposals Helps Wall Street Manage a Small Gain
